caption: Yummy food, top notch service! Will definitely be back to the dc location on Connecticut!

Just had our minds and taste buds blown by this amazing vegan restaurant. Their flavors sing with such an original zest, and their responsible packaging was smartly designed. Good thing that this was DoorDash or our "Mmmmms" would have been blushworthy.

I had the Ziggy Burger, sweet potato fries, and kale lemonade. Best vegan burger I’ve ever had!!! Forgot I wasn’t eating meat for a second lol. It was cooked to perfection and the sauce paired with it well. The fries were a good temperature and the lemonade was tasty. Definitely will return the next time is visit DC :)

This was my 1st time here and my experience was amazing the food was so fresh and hot the organic fruit punch was SO GOOD!!!!!! Rodney was very friendly when helping me order I don’t know the lady that was cooking the food but job well done my new favorite place to eat before work.

Apparently the Chinatown location can’t be reviewed? I was gonna give it five stars anyways 😂 for the amazing quality of that smoothie, it was pretty cheap. The burger didn’t sit heavy at all, so I would totally go back!

I tend to steer clear of places that try to “re-do” fast food. They’re usually unnecessarily expensive without tasting good or being healthy.  But, I got their sweet potato fries and nuggets last week and was really impressed by both. If you’re going to get something here, those are the menu items I recommend!  I went back to try a full meal today and ordered the standard burger, a cookie, and the strawberry rhubarb fountain drink. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed. The burger tasted bland and overly processed; the cookie was hard and stale; the juice tasted almost fermented? I hope I didn’t just drink something expired. I wish I could take back the almost $20 meal...definitely will not be coming back.
Great Oh Maitake Beyond Burger, good smoothies (but tiny serving size for the price), okay soup.

This is my favorite location of all the ones I've been to. The staff is great, breakfast is decently priced and for some reason this seems to be the only place in the city where you can get a vegan breakfast sandwich and hashbrowns (why every other vegan place hates hashbrowns I have no idea). It's always clean and generally quiet. However, it's a bad look that management doesn't allow the staff to accept tips from card purchases.
Everything thing is delicious, excellent food, excellent customer service, even courteous curbside delivery 😃
My favourite vegan fast food in DC by far. The crispy chicken with buffalo sauce is so damn satisfying
Delicious vegetarian fast food.  The fake chicken is better than the fake burgers.  And the prices are a bit on the high side. But they nail the execution and the experience.

The little short guy was very rude. We only came in the restaurant to eat some good vegan food we came from out of town and the little short guy was very rude. Mannerism were very off even when he handed us the food he just us to get out he needs an attitude check.
It's yummy but definitely overpriced.
very good sweet potato fries

Sometimes even the strictest vegan needs a Philly Cheese Steak or a Spicy Crispy Chicken Sandwich. When that moment hits, HipCity Veg has you totally covered. Great tasting, fast food style, comfort food, but made fresh while you wait.
Pricey but so tasty and so worth it as a treat to oneself. The absolute best sweet potato fries I’ve ever tasted! I’ll definitely be back!

Had the Philly cheesesteak (I loved it!) and my meat eating friend really loved her Ziggy burger and might come back without me! Loved the vanilla and pumpkin spice milkshakes. Not the cheapest, two dollar signs, aesthetic and atmosphere was great, would highly recommend this all vegan place!!
Delicious as usual. Some of the best vegan comfort food I've ever had.
Loved my Grilled Disco Chick'n sandwich and sweet potato fries! So delicious and just happy to have an entire menu of veggie options. Quick and super friendly service.
love them so much

The food at HipCityVeg is so decadent and delicious that you will realize that you can eat a plant-based diet with so little sacrifice that it's kind of not even a big deal anymore. My favorite is the Crispy HipCity Ranch.

The bucket of wings is a must-have. I made mine buffalo and got the aioli with it, which was a great choice. Also, love their fajita wrap! Banana whip for dessert will satisfy any sweet tooth. Love it here!!!
Great food and the employees were amazing, extremely attentive and the restaurant was clean and the service was fast! I’m looking forward to coming back.

Absolutely amazing This was our first time visiting this establishment and it was everything plus more! Everyone was very helpful and very nice. Excellent customer service has become a dying trend but they exceeded my expectations! I had the Philly Cheese Steak (totally vegan) it was great. My wife had the Smoke House burger, it was great! I would highly recommend it to anyone. Even if you're not totally sure if you would like a "vegan" meal..give it a try!

Super disappointed. Came here twice just to order sweet potato fries. Both times I was shocked at the tiny portion of the fries, especially when you order it as a side. You would think they would give you more than 5oz of fries when they charge $5 for it. HipCityVeg, please consider upping the fries container so that it would hold a decent amount of fries that adults can eat. The amount you currently give is pathetic. It’s basically kids size and overpriced and sad as a standalone order.
Good place to be
Vegan healthy foods all vegan plant based food
Delicious food, with delicious desert! Would come again. Loved the banana whip!

As a Vegan searching for exciting restaurants throughout DC I was very disappointed with the value I received from Hip City. My partner and I paid nearly $40 for what amounted to a bowl of spinach with tofu thrown in, and a beyond meat burger with what appeared to be three toppings.  I understand that vegan products and flavors cost more than your typical ingredients, but if I pay several dollars more than what it would cost     to purchase these ingredients at the store, I expect to at least be satisfied and full afterwards.  I will not be returning here, nor will I be recommending this to anyone in my social circle pursuing veganism.
Great food! This is a terrific choice for vegan food in a fast casual setting. Very clean inside. The sweet potato fries were yummy.
Pricy, online menu is wrong when it says GF bread options for burgers
Great food. Highly recommended.
On behalf of my vegan husband he loves it. They have vegan junk food (burgers,  fries,  shakes) and pretty good salad. Little offset. He has been there twice.
Quick and friendly service, would definitely recommend! I am visiting from Florida and I loved it!
Delicious!

We must say, the staff at the Connecticut and Chinatown locations are so friendly and helpful with customers. We have an IG page for Vegan Spots in the DMV to bring more awareness to vegan foods and how great they taste. Our new favorite items are the Philly Steak and Crispy Chick'n Sandwich!!! OMG this place is perfect for meat eaters who want to transition or find plant based options to try. The vanilla shake was perfect!!! Perfect!!! We are definitely new fans. Best vegan Chick'n Sandwich we've had so far.  We are new Restauranteurs. Check us out @dmv_vegantg 😁..
Pretty good if your vegan even has vegan desserts for you sweet tooths.
Always has the best food.  Chicken nuggets, cheesesteak, milkshakes are all amazing!  Get the hip city sauce on the side
Came here with a smile and left here with a smile. 😄 first timer.

Very good vegan food. Everage cost person $20 lunch with drinks made in store. There was lots of street parking  and seating available in the store. Although I think it was a bit expensive for what it is.

Fast food for the non meat eaters. Tasty burgers and nuggets. This is the place I go to when I have a craving for nuggets and fries. First time trying the Crispy HipCity Ranch and it did not disappoint.
HipCityVeg is such a good addition to the vegan food scene in DC. Fast. Yummy. Good customer service. Great menu. I love the Disco Chick'n Sandwich.

SO GOOD! And the ladies working there were just so kind and friendly- we got caught in the downpour and they let us linger until the rain subsided even though they were closing. And thoroughly enjoyed talking to them about the menu- I need to try everything!

VEGAN FAST Food!!!! Literally the best not chicken chick'n sandwich!!! The  sweet potato fries are so crispy and don't get me started on the hip city sauce!!!! The Tangerine drink is my all time Favorite!!!!
Great food, can't recommend the brunch enough.
The soy chicken is AMAZING! Big fan of the nuggets. Delicious food!
Took wayyyyy to long

I love the food but this place can do better. First the prices are OUT OF CONTROL. Second, placed an online order recently and none of my requests had been honored. Asked for no sauce on the burger for example and it was DOUSED with sauce. Could not eat it, despite the expensive price tag... Sent them an email about my experience and never heard back. Sent a second email asking for a follow up and weeks later I'm still waiting. This is ultimately pretty telling of how a company values their customers - that they're not even bothered to reply with a "sorry."
Delicious. I basically tried everything with extra sauce and loved it all. Favorite was chicken sandwich with pickles.

If they had regular potato fries, this place would be perfect. The food is beyond good. I would eat here all the time if I could. This is a great option for eco-friendly/vegan catering or just getting your fried food fix in if you're missing chickfila as a new vegetarian. The ingredients are fresh and the food is delicious. The chocolate milkshake did taste like sugar cookie dough - amazing, but not ideal.
Excellent vegan chicken sandwiches. Absolutely incredible. Amazing sauce.
Took over 30 minutes to get a burger. It was good but definitely wouldn’t go back for the price and wait.

The food was good and the chocolate shake was perfect! I had an order of nuggets and the Smokehouse Burger. The wasn't anything particularly extraordinary about the burger but it was tasty. The sauces were good but my fav was the hiocity sauce. Sweet and very reminiscent of ChickFil sauce. My friend had the Jerk chicken salad and said it was good. Next time I'm in the area, I'd definitely like to try other menu items.  The space is bright and colorful with music piped throughout. Only negative is that it took a very long time for someone to clean off a table for us to sit at (I had to ask a couple times).
Very good food for me as a vegetarian! Loved the food and the Kale lemonade. The staff were very friendly

This is my favorite place to eat! As a vegan its hard to find places to eat so when I discovered HipCityVeg near my work I was beyond excited. I eat there at least once a week if not more. For starters, the Nuggets are so amazing and especially good with the HipCityVeg sauce. My favorite thing on the menu us the Jerk Cesar, it is the best Vegan salad I have ever had! I used to just get it as a side salad but once I had it with the grilled "chicken" I couldn't go back. Their breakfast is good also, the hashbrowns are the best!
More spacious than the Chinatown location, excellent Nuggets
It was different and very good.
Dope. Definitely would go again

Just a heads up that the "gluten free sandwiches" are actually just salads! This is not stated anywhere online or in-store and no one told me, even when I ordered a side salad to go with my "sandwich." Did not know until my order was ready that I had ordered two salads. The staff was very nice about it and let me substitute fries, but please make it clear for people what they are ordering! The salad was also quite small for the price.

The location in Chinatown is pretty good, the Dupont circle one is less so. The staff that Dupont circle seem quite lazy and unmotivated. I have been there 4-5 times and I have never had the process of ordering and getting my food go smoothly, they usually forget some portion of the order and you have to show a receipt to prove them wrong. The tables are rarely cleaned and the staff are pretty rude. On the chain in general: kinda pricey but to be expected for vegan food, sometimes makes people sick. I've known 3 people get sick after eating at a hipciryveg, we think its the chicken nuggets so avoid those I guess. Other than that food is good.
Food was good.  Atmosphere was ok.
Ok, the food was very tasty. However the price of the Smokehouse burger was $11 and it was half of sandwich. It was a little unorganized in there too. The food was very good.
Awesome menu of all vegetarian/vegan options. I have had the Crispy 'Chicken' Sandwich and the Philly 'Cheesesteak' and both were delicious. They even got the bread right on the cheesesteak!
Excellent food.  Pricey but tasty.

Absolutely delicious. Fast service and very cute little restaurant. The chocolate shake blew me away and the chicken sandwich was so yummy. The hip city sauce is really good as is the aioli. I liked it so much I came back for breakfast the next day. Wish there was one near me back in Arkansas!

This is a new restaurant that opened in the elite Dupont area of NW DC. This area in general is a gourmet foodie delight and the competition for customers is fierce with several top of the line food places within a few blocks radius.  HipCituVeg is a vegan place primarily specializing in mock meat. They sell the impossible meat burgers, tempeh burgers and “chicken” fajitas among other things. The food is good but I felt the portions are relatively small. They prefer you do takeout since the seating is limited.  I tried their burger and fajita and both were very tasty.  Overall the place is great and I hope they survive the competition. There was another vegan restaurant (Native Foods) that had opened across the Connecticut Ave 5 years ago. They were a lot bigger and a lot more popular than this place but eventually closed down. I am keeping my fingers crossed that these guys survive.  The place is definitely recommended, at least as a check out.
Hands down the best vegan burger I ever had in my life so far.
Delicious food and friendly staff

Just had the beyond meat smoke burger. That patty was really good. I’m a meat eater so I was surprised it tasted delicious like that. I added pickles just to make it oh so much better 😋. I think I would prefer to try it next time without the bbq sauce and do ketchup and mustard instead. It was still good with the bbq sauce though. Only negative I can say is it’s a little pricey ($13 bucks)  SIDENOTE: if you tried the beyond meat whopper from bk this burger taste nothing like it. It’s wayyyy better. It’s hot, fresh and juicy compared to the bk version which has more of smokey, burnt, dry taste.

Came in shortly before closing on 19 Nov. 2019,  10 minutes beforehand and felt :-/.  The hours on the door said 10 but with the new breakfast menu they were closing at 9.  It wasn't cold cold so I thought I'd get the food to go and be on with life.  I like HipCityVeg but man!  Everyone was so nice and accommodating at the end of what I imagine is a long day.  I wish I could've stayed longer just to be around such beautiful spirits.  They really made an impression on me.
Just because it looks like fast food, that doesn’t mean you will get out of there fast. I literally stared at my salad for over 5 min before it was handed to me so I can leave. Taste was it just ok.
Everything is always AMAZING
Delicious chick'n sandwich and sweet potato fries! Amazing pumpkin shake and yummy, moist brownie. Going back for sure!!! Even my non-vegan, burger loving mom loved her vegan burger. Impressive.

Super clean establishment, with a purly vegan menu that caters to those of us as former meat eaters. They have the Beyond Burger and soy based grilled chicken sandwiches that are delicious. Nice selection of music playing, although its right on the borderline of being to loud to have a meaningful conversation across the table without slightly raised voices. All in all, I'd highly recommend this establishment for a meal.
Slamming place in the Chocolate City, a hidden gem for sure

One of the best vegan foods I've had in a while I tried their Ziggy burger and marinated tofu wrap and both were amazing. It's right next to DuPont Circle metro, so, is easily accessible for all the reasons. The spot is new and growing, waiting for their breakfast section to get launched too. Amazing job!
Delicious and great customer service
Delicious vegan food and this location actually has seating!! Can't wait for breakfast to be available!!
Smokehouse Burger is spot on, Alicia was absolutely incredible. Can't wait for them to open Breakfast this year. Go here, and go as much as you can!
Really good veggie fast food, but holy smokes it's pricey. Expect to spend about $25 for entree, fries, and a drink.

A great location on Connecticut Avenue NW, just south of Dupont Circle. Once you step into the shop, you are warmly greeted by the staff.  I love the layout of this restaurant.  All food items on the menu are plant based.  Each is seasoned well, and tasty!  My favorite, the Philly Steak. I have them add avocado slices to it. Perfect!

Always great to have vegetarian/vegan options that taste great! I wanted to go bunless so they easily turned my sandwich into a salad. The staff were very friendly. There was even a composting option next to the trash and the cutlery was eco-friendly. Good tasting, fast-casual food I can feel good about.
So good! Though a bit overpriced for fast food.
Really good service, food was descent.
Great food and service. I can't wait for them to start selling breakfast
We received complimentary smoothies and they were delicious.  Everything there was vegan and earth friendly.
Great food
Delicious vegan chick'n sandwiches, sweet potato fries, and shakes. There's much more but those are the essentials. Breakfast coming soon, too!
So delicious and healthy. So excited for breakfast options!

A few concerns, hopefully they will work it out and these are just new restaurant woes. First, the way they've got ordering set up, you can only see the paper menu before ordering, and it has no prices. Then they try to upsell you on things like avocado and buffalo sauce (why on Earth is buffalo sauce an extra charge???) without ever saying these things cost more or how much they cost. It's obvious avocado will cost extra but I genuinely did not expect buffalo sauce would cost extra. Second, the food was very slow to come out and there were a ton of people waiting. The sandwich was kind of a mess and not very well constructed. But this was during the lunch rush and they just opened like a week ago so I'm optimistic they'll be able to fix all that. Third is not very fixable: I did not appreciate paying $12.30 for a simple fast food chicken sandwich with no sides. I know that it's expensive because it's fake meat instead of real meat, so it's better for the environment. I actually do not believe it is any healthier in the case of chicken. I am not a vegetarian so maybe this is just targeted at people who can't have a real chicken sandwich and are so excited to have a safe kind of cheat day or something. It tastes pretty good, but I don't think it really makes sense to do this with any regularity. I imagine people from the future being like wait, people paid *extra* for the fake meat?? When real meat was available?? I would love to try the smoothies and the banana whip, but I already spent my whole lunch budget on a simple "chick'n" sandwich. Attaching my photo of the menu that is around the corner from where I ordered so that you can see prices if you are waiting in line and don't get tricked into paying a dollar for buffalo sauce like I did!

Went there thinking it was actual chicken they used (turns out it is not). Ended up with the curry tofu wrap and was very pleasantly surprised.  Large portions and their sauces are awesome! Sweet potato fries are solid as well.  My friend got the buffalo chicken sandwich thinking it was actual chicken and liked it a lot.  They were crowded and the kitchen seemed a bit chaotic which makes sense as they are newly opened, but got my food in about 5 minutes and it was tasty. Bit pricey, but good portions.
This is amazing food and the staff are just so hip, they really are fun and kind.  Get the chocolate milkshake, get any of the entres.  Food comes out fast and perfect.  Plant-based deliciousness!
This place blew me away.  Everything I tried was absolutely delicious.  The fries are ridiculous.  Best fake chicken nuggets and ssndwich I've ever eaten.  HCV goes into weekly lunch rotation.
Delicious food. Get the smokehouse burger, get the whip, get the nuggets. The staff there is amazing as well!!!

After a week open to the public, the food is ON POINT. The sweet potato fries were crispy on the outside and melt in your mouth fluffy on the inside. The chick'n sandwich was made fresh to order. Add the hip city sauce and your taste buds will thank you! The staff is also delightful and welcoming. They are reason enough for our next visit.
Love this place 💗

Tried the udon salad and tangerine-turmeric lemonade and both great on flavors! Serving size of the salad was on the modest side imo and compared to lunch-option-competitors in the area. Was treated to sweet potato fries on grand opening day, and loved those with the sriracha aioli.
